name: Acid Splash
description: You splash a glob of acid that splatters your target and nearby creatures. Make a spell attack. If you hit, you deal 1d6 acid damage plus 1 splash acid damage. On a critical success, the target also takes 1 persistent acid damage.

heightened.+1: The initial damage increases by 1d6, and the splash damage increases by 1.

name: Chill Touch
description: Siphoning negative energy into your hand, you touch a creature to afflict it with ghoulish rot. The target takes 1d4 negative damage and 1d4 persistent negative damage. If the target is undead, it takes 1d4 positive damage with no persistent damage.

heightened.+1: The negative damage increases by 1d4, and the persistent damage increases by 1d4.

name: Dancing Lights
description: You create up to four floating lights, no two of which are more than 10 feet apart. Each sheds light like a torch. You can move them with a Sustain a Spell action.

name: Daze
description: You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The target takes 1d6 mental damage, or nothing on a successful save. On a critical failure, the target is also stunned 1.

name: Detect Magic
description: You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

heightened.3rd: You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects.
heightened.7th: As 3rd level, but you also pinpoint the source.

name: Divine Lance
description: You unleash a beam of divine energy. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You deal 1d4 damage of the alignment you chose to the target.

name: Electric Arc
description: An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another. Each target takes 1d4 electricity damage.

name: Guidance
description: You ask for divine guidance, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. A target can't be under the effect of more than one guidance spell at a time.

name: Light
duration: until the next time you make your daily preparations
description: The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch.

heightened.4th: The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).

name: Mage Hand
description: You create a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly nearby. You can Interact to move the object up to 20 feet. The hand can hold only objects of light Bulk or less.

name: Message
description: You mouth words quietly, but instead of coming out of your mouth, they are transmitted to the target. The target can respond in the same fashion.

name: Prestidigitation
description: The simplest magic does your bidding. You can perform simple magical effects for as long as you Sustain the Spell: cook, lift, make, or tidy small items.

name: Produce Flame
description: A small ball of flame appears in the palm of your hand, and you lash out with it either in melee or at range. Make a spell attack roll against your target's AC. On a success, you deal 1d4 fire damage plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

name: Ray of Frost
description: You blast an icy ray. Make a spell attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 cold damage and takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

name: Read Aura
description: You focus on the target object, opening your mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, you know whether that item is magical, and if it is, you learn the school of magic.

heightened.3rd: You can target up to 10 objects.
heightened.6th: As 3rd level, and you also learn the tradition of magic if the item is a spell effect.

name: Shield
duration: until the start of your next turn
description: You raise a magical shield of force. This gives you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. While the spell is in effect, you can use the Shield Block reaction with your magical shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes.

name: Stabilize
description: Positive energy shuts death's door. The target loses the dying condition, though it remains unconscious at 0 Hit Points.

name: Tanglefoot
description: A vine lashes out from your hand to hold a creature in place. Make a spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

name: Telekinetic Projectile
description: You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, you deal 1d6 bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damageâ€”as appropriate for the object you hurled.

name: Bane
description: You fill the minds of your enemies with doubt. Targets that fail their Will save take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls.

heightened.every 2 levels: You can target one additional enemy.

name: Bless
description: Blessings from beyond fill you and your allies with confidence. You and allies gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

name: Burning Hands
description: Gouts of flame rush from your hands in a 15-foot cone, dealing 2d6 fire damage.

name: Charm
description: To the target, your words are honey and your visage is beatific. The target must attempt a Will save. Critical Success: The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it. Success: Unaffected but unaware. Failure: The target's attitude becomes friendly toward you for the duration. Critical Failure: As failure, and the target can't be hostile toward you for the duration.

name: Color Spray
description: Swirling colors affect creatures in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must attempt a Will save. Failure: The creature is dazzled for 1 round. Critical Failure: The creature is stunned 1, blinded for 1 round, and dazzled for 1 minute.

name: Command
description: You shout a command that's hard to ignore. You can command the target to approach, drop, flee, grovel, or release. The target must follow the command on its next turn.

heightened.5th: You can target up to 10 creatures.

name: Fear
description: You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save. Failure: The target is frightened 2. Critical Failure: The target is frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 round.

heightened.3rd: You can target up to 5 creatures.

name: Feather Fall
description: You cause the air itself to arrest a fall. The target's fall slows to 60 feet per round, and the portion of the fall during the casting is treated as if the target had fallen 0 feet.

name: Grease
description: You conjure grease, covering a 4-square area. Each creature standing on the grease must succeed at a Reflex save or fall prone. Creatures using a move action to enter the area must attempt an Acrobatics check to Balance.

name: Heal
description: You channel positive energy to heal the living or damage the undead. 1 action: touch, heal 1d8. 2 actions: 30-foot range, heal 1d8. 3 actions: 30-foot emanation, heal 1d8 to all living, damage 1d8 to all undead (basic Fortitude save for undead).

heightened.+1: The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8.

name: Harm
description: You channel negative energy to harm the living or heal the undead. 1 action: touch, deal 1d8 negative damage (Fortitude save). 2 actions: 30-foot range, deal 1d8. 3 actions: 30-foot emanation, deal 1d8 to all living (basic Fortitude).

name: Magic Missile
description: You send a dart of force streaking toward a creature that you can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage. For each additional action you spend, you send an additional missile.

heightened.+2: You shoot one additional missile with each action you spend.

name: Magic Weapon
description: The weapon glimmers with magic and energy. It becomes a +1 striking weapon, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and dealing an extra die of damage.

name: Sanctuary
description: You ward a creature against attack. Any creature that attempts to attack the target or use a hostile action against it must attempt a Will save. On a failure, the creature can't complete the attack.

name: Shocking Grasp
description: You shroud your hands in a powerful field of lightning and make a melee spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d12 electricity damage. If the target is wearing metal armor, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll and the target takes 1d4 persistent electricity damage on a hit.

name: Sleep
description: Each creature in the area becomes drowsy and might fall asleep. Creatures that fail become unconscious. A creature can attempt a new Will save at the end of each of its turns to wake up.

heightened.4th: The targets also fall unconscious for 1 round on a successful save.

name: True Strike
duration: until the end of your turn
description: A glimpse of the future ensures your next attack strikes true. The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result. The attack ignores any circumstance penalties from unfavorable conditions.

name: Acid Arrow
description: You conjure an arrow of acid that continues corroding the target after it hits. Make a spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 3d8 acid damage plus 1d6 persistent acid damage. On a critical hit, double the initial damage but not the persistent damage.

heightened.+2: The initial damage increases by 2d8, and the persistent damage increases by 1d6.

name: Blur
description: The target's form appears blurry. It becomes concealed. As the nature of this effect still leaves a clear outline, the concealment only applies to determining if you're hidden, not to other benefits of being concealed.

name: Darkness
description: You create an area of darkness in a 20-foot burst. Creatures in the area can't see. If any of this area overlaps with an area of light from a non-magical source, the spell suppresses the light.

heightened.4th: Non-magical light can't counter the darkness.

name: Dispel Magic
targets: 1 spell effect or unattended magic item
description: You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the spell or effect.

name: Enlarge
description: Bolstered by magical power, the target grows to size Large. Its equipment grows with it but returns to normal size if removed. The creature is clumsy 1. Its reach increases by 5 feet and it gains a +2 status bonus to melee damage.

heightened.4th: The creature can grow to Huge. Clumsy 1, reach +10 feet.

name: Invisibility
description: Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes invisible. The spell ends if the target uses a hostile action.

heightened.4th: The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

name: Resist Energy
description: A shield of elemental energy protects the target. Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. The target gains resistance 5 to that energy type.

name: Restoration
description: Restorative magic counters the effects of toxins or conditions on the target. Reduce the target's clumsy, enfeebled, or stupefied condition value by 2. You can instead reduce the target's drained condition value by 1.

heightened.4th: You also remove a single disease or the blinded or deafened condition.

name: Fireball
description: A roaring blast of fire appears in a 20-foot burst, dealing 6d6 fire damage to every creature in the area.

name: Haste
description: Magic quickens the target. The target gains the quickened condition for the duration. It can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

heightened.7th: You can target up to 6 creatures.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A bolt of lightning strikes outward from your hands, dealing 4d12 electricity damage to each creature in a 120-foot line.

name: Slow
description: You dilate the flow of time around the target, slowing its actions. The target becomes slowed 1.

heightened.6th: You can target up to 10 creatures.

name: Fly
description: The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater. If the target is airborne when the spell ends, it floats to the ground gently.

name: Freedom of Movement
description: The target's movement is unhindered. It ignores difficult terrain, greater difficult terrain, and the effects of immobilized, paralyzed, slowed, and grabbed conditions.

name: Wall of Fire
description: You raise a blazing wall that sears creatures that dare to cross it. The wall is either a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high, or a ring with a 10-foot radius and 10-feet tall. The wall deals 4d6 fire damage to creatures that are in its space, and 2d6 fire damage to creatures that end their turn adjacent to it.

heightened.+1: The damage increases by 1d6 for both the main and adjacent damage.

name: Cone of Cold
description: Icy cold rushes forth from your hands in a 60-foot cone, dealing 12d6 cold damage.

name: Banishment
targets: 1 creature not on its home plane
description: You send the target back to its home plane. The target must attempt a Will save. Failure: The target is sent to its home plane.

heightened.9th: You can target up to 10 creatures.

name: Chain Lightning
description: You discharge a powerful bolt of lightning at the target, dealing 8d12 electricity damage. The bolt then jumps to another target within 30 feet of the first, dealing the same damage minus 1d12, then jumps again, and so on (maximum 5 jumps, dealing 1d12 less each time).

heightened.+1: The damage to the primary target increases by 1d12.

name: Disintegrate
description: You fire a green ray at your target. The target takes 12d10 damage. If it's reduced to 0 HP, it's destroyed utterly.

name: Heal
description: A more powerful version of heal. 1 action: 6d8 healing. 2 actions: 6d8 at 30-foot range. 3 actions: 6d8 in a 30-foot emanation.

name: True Seeing
description: The target sees things within 60 feet as they actually are. The target can see through illusions, see invisible creatures and objects, see the true form of polymorphed creatures, and see into the Ethereal Plane.

name: Finger of Death
description: You point your finger toward the target and speak a word of slaying. The target takes 70 negative damage, with a Fortitude save. A creature killed by finger of death rises as a zombie under your command.

name: Plane Shift
targets: you and up to 8 willing creatures
description: You and your allies are transported to another plane of existence you name.

name: Regenerate
description: An infusion of positive energy heals the target and grants fast healing. The target regains 4d8 Hit Points and gains fast healing 8 for the duration.

heightened.9th: The initial healing is 6d8 and the fast healing is 10.

name: Earthquake
description: You shake the ground within a 60-foot burst. Each creature in the area must succeed at a Reflex save or fall prone. The ground becomes difficult terrain. Structures in the area take 60 bludgeoning damage.

heightened.10th: The damage to structures increases to 100.

name: Power Word Stun
description: You stun the target with a single utterance. If the target has 150 or fewer remaining Hit Points, it is stunned for a variable number of rounds based on its HP. 50 or fewer: stunned for as long as you Sustain. 51-100: stunned 1d4 rounds. 101-150: stunned 1 round. Over 150: unaffected.

name: Meteor Swarm
description: You call down four blazing meteors that crash down in four 40-foot bursts within range. Each creature in any of the bursts takes 6d10 bludgeoning damage and 14d6 fire damage.

name: Power Word Kill
description: You utter the most powerful word of power. If the target has 50 or fewer remaining Hit Points, it dies immediately. If it has more, it takes 50 damage.

name: Wish
description: You state a wish, making your greatest desire come true. The GM determines exactly how your wish is fulfilled. Wish can produce any of the following effects: duplicate any arcane spell of 9th level or lower, duplicate any non-arcane spell of 7th level or lower, produce any effect whose power level is in line with the above, or reverse certain magical effects.
